title: Why NA  servers it's down?
body:
Hey 

Why NA servers down ? 

 and i go to settings  account and  hes teell me not login yet with red :) and  at morning works to login etc :)

Sry for my english again

replies.body: The server had some downtime due to maintenance.  Keep an eye out on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page of updates on what's going on.  At this time, everything should be good to go!
